title: Enhancing Scientific Inquiry Skills Through Technology-Mediated Situated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic scientific terminology and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Learners are pre-service teachers researching elementary science education methodologies in graduate programs, performing projects in digital learning environments simulating real classroom settings.

learning_goals: Learners can collect, analyze, and visualize scientific experimental data using technological tools.
Learners can develop context-specific problem-solving strategies for scientific issues through online collaboration with peers.
Learners can complete instructional design applying scientific concepts in digital scenarios that reflect real classroom environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
